DOC.brief_summary: Determination of risk factors of ventricular arrhythmias (VAs) after implantation of continuous flow left ventricular assist device in order to characterize which patient requires ICD implantation in primary prevention.
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Risk Factors of Ventricular Arrhythmias (VAs) After Implantation of Continuous Flow Left Ventricular Assist Device With Continuous Flow Left Ventricular Assist Device (CF-LVAD)
DOC.criteria: Patient above 18 years old Patients with CFLVAD with or without ICD Patients subject to major legal protection (safeguarding justice, guardianship, trusteeship), persons deprived of liberty
